content.question: The highly detailed imagery carved in the lintels at Yaxchil√°n, such as in Lintel 25, shown, were intended to

choices.label: underscore the importance of Maya rulers and their ability to communicate with spirits
convey the chaos of recent battles that occurred between rivaling Maya kingdoms
demonstrate the superiority of Mayan deities over the gods of neighboring cultures
educate the living about the passage of the souls of deceased Mayans into the afterlife

content.answer: underscore the importance of Maya rulers and their ability to communicate with spirits
